ygData.subject: A Little Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, this is completely off topic BUT I need your help.  My guild is doing a joint guild event in South Karana sometime in the near future (with 5 other
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, this is completely off topic BUT I need your help. My guild is doing a joint guild event in South Karana sometime in the near future (with 5 other guilds). I, being a fun loving party bard, have been appointed to the "events" committee. Problem is I'm not feeling very creative today and I'm fresh out of new and amusing ideas. I want to
try to do something fun that isn't the same old same old. I figure the best place to go for some ideas would be here! The home of the fun loving, party enhancing, entertaining bard.

Thanks for you ideas in advance :)

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 50th song
Prexus
